an6.76:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.76:1.3: Mānaṁ, omānaṁ, atimānaṁ, adhimānaṁ, thambhaṁ, atinipātaṁ.
an6.76:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.76:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.76:2.3: Mānaṁ, omānaṁ, atimānaṁ, adhimānaṁ, thambhaṁ, atinipātaṁ.
an6.76:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātun”ti.
